en.form_header.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_PROP_TE:
Partner Readiness Assessment

Discover your partnership potential with Nintex
en.thank_you_message.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_P: Thank you for completing the Nintex Partner Readiness Assessment. We will review your responses and follow up with next steps.
en.primary_market.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_PROP: e.g., Northeast US, UK & Ireland, APAC
en.years_business.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_PROP:
Less than 2 years|<2
2-5 years|2-5
6-10 years|6-10
11-20 years|11-20
20+ years|20+
en.business_presence_type.FORMDESIGNER_CONT: Which best describes your business presence?
Understanding your customer-facing operations and business stability

Established office(s) with regular customer visits (Readiness: High)|established_office
Professional office space for meetings and operations (Readiness: High)|professional_office
Flexible/co-working space with professional meeting capabilities (Readiness: Medium)|flexible_workspace
Primarily remote but with established business processes (Readiness: Medium)|primarily_remote
Home-based business (Readiness: Low)|home_based
en.sales_structure.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_PRO: How is your sales team structured?
Help us understand how your sales organization is structured for growth

Dedicated sales team with professional sales manager/director (Readiness: High)|dedicated_sales_team
Professional salespeople with proven track records (Readiness: High)|sales_professionals
CEO/owner sells alongside dedicated sales staff (Readiness: Medium)|ceo_plus_sales
Technical team members handle sales activities (Readiness: Medium)|technical_team_sells
CEO/owner is the primary salesperson (Readiness: Low)|ceo_primary_seller
en.business_dev_methods.FORMDESIGNER_CONTRO: How do you generate new business? (Select all that apply)
Select all the methods you actively use to acquire new customers

Outbound prospecting (phone, email campaigns) (Readiness: High)|outbound_prospecting
LinkedIn and social media selling (Readiness: High)|social_selling
Content marketing and thought leadership (Readiness: High)|content_marketing
Trade shows and industry events (Readiness: Medium)|trade_shows
Strategic partner referrals (Readiness: Medium)|partner_referrals
Systematic customer referral program (Readiness: Medium)|systematic_referrals
Website and inbound marketing leads (Readiness: Medium)|inbound_leads
Word of mouth referrals (Readiness: Low)|word_of_mouth
Primarily wait for incoming inquiries (Readiness: Low)|wait_for_calls
en.market_reputation.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_P: How would you describe your reputation and standing in your market?

Recognized market leader with strong brand recognition (Readiness: High)|market_leader
Well-established with good customer testimonials (Readiness: High)|established_player
Growing reputation with positive customer feedback (Readiness: Medium)|growing_reputation
Emerging player building market presence (Readiness: Medium)|emerging_player
New to market or rebuilding reputation (Readiness: Low)|new_to_market
en.organizational_culture.FORMDESIGNER_CONT: How would you characterize your company culture and primary strengths?

Balanced technical expertise and sales excellence (Readiness: High)|balanced_approach
Sales-driven with strong technical support (Readiness: High)|sales_driven
Technical focus but strong appreciation for sales (Readiness: Medium)|technical_with_sales
Primarily technical with emerging sales focus (Readiness: Low)|primarily_technical
Engineering/technical focused organization (Readiness: Low)|engineering_focused
en.partnership_approach.FORMDESIGNER_CONTRO: How do you typically approach vendor partnerships and collaboration?

Highly collaborative, view vendors as strategic partners (Readiness: High)|collaborative_partner
Open communication, willing to share customer insights (Readiness: High)|open_communication
Prefer structured processes and clear expectations (Readiness: Medium)|structured_approach
Cautious approach, need to build trust gradually (Readiness: Medium)|cautious_partnership
Primarily transactional, protect customer relationships (Readiness: Low)|transactional_focus
en.customer_engagement_comfort.FORMDESIGNER: How comfortable are you with Nintex engaging directly with your customers when appropriate?

Encourage joint customer engagement for better outcomes (Readiness: High)|encourage_engagement
Welcome it with proper structure and communication (Readiness: High)|structured_engagement
Open to it on a case-by-case basis (Readiness: Medium)|case_by_case
Prefer to maintain primary customer relationship (Readiness: Low)|limited_engagement
Prefer to handle all customer communication internally (Readiness: Low)|protective_approach
en.sales_approach.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_PROP: How do your salespeople typically engage with prospects?

Consultative approach focused on business problems and ROI (Readiness: High)|consultative_selling
Solution-focused with good discovery questions (Readiness: High)|solution_focused
Mix of technical demos and business discussions (Readiness: Medium)|mixed_approach
Primarily technical discussions and feature demonstrations (Readiness: Low)|technical_focus
Respond to specific customer requests and RFPs (Readiness: Low)|reactive_selling
en.training_readiness.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_: How do you view partner training and certification programs?

Enthusiastic about training, see it as competitive advantage (Readiness: High)|enthusiastic_learner
Committed to team development and certification (Readiness: High)|committed_development
Willing to participate in required training programs (Readiness: Medium)|willing_participant
Selective about training based on time and resources (Readiness: Medium)|selective_training
Prefer minimal training, learn as we go (Readiness: Low)|minimal_training
en.pipeline_transparency.FORMDESIGNER_CONTR: How comfortable are you with regular pipeline reviews and forecasting collaboration?

Full transparency, regular pipeline reviews are valuable (Readiness: High)|full_transparency
Comfortable with structured monthly/quarterly reviews (Readiness: High)|structured_reviews
Willing to share high-level pipeline information (Readiness: Medium)|high_level_sharing
Prefer to share information on a need-to-know basis (Readiness: Low)|limited_sharing
Keep pipeline information confidential (Readiness: Low)|confidential_pipeline
en.success_measurement.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL: How do you prefer to measure and track partnership success? (Select all that apply)

Clear revenue targets and growth goals (Readiness: High)|revenue_targets
Customer satisfaction and retention metrics (Readiness: High)|customer_satisfaction
Market expansion and new customer acquisition (Readiness: High)|market_expansion
Team certification and competency levels (Readiness: Medium)|certification_levels
Activity metrics (calls, demos, proposals) (Readiness: Medium)|activity_metrics
Relationship quality and collaboration effectiveness (Readiness: Medium)|relationship_quality
Informal assessment and feedback (Readiness: Low)|informal_assessment
en.partnership_goals.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL_P: What are your primary goals for partnering with Nintex? (Select all that apply)

Accelerate revenue growth (Readiness: High)|revenue_growth
Expand solution portfolio for customers (Readiness: High)|solution_expansion
Gain competitive advantage in market (Readiness: High)|competitive_advantage
Increase customer value and satisfaction (Readiness: High)|customer_value
Market differentiation and positioning (Readiness: Medium)|market_differentiation
Enhance technical capabilities (Readiness: Medium)|technical_capability
Geographic or vertical market expansion (Readiness: Medium)|geographic_expansion
Vendor portfolio diversification (Readiness: Low)|vendor_diversification
en.additional_comments.FORMDESIGNER_CONTROL: Optional: Share any additional context about your organization or partnership interests

properties.text:
Partner Readiness Assessment

Discover your partnership potential with Nintex
